article_title: Number Of Americans Without Health Insurance Falling Rapidly

article_metadata.author: Bruce Japsen

og.description: Evidence is mounting that the Affordable Care Act is working to dramatically reduce the number of uninsured Americans, despite questions about whether Americans were buying policies just to replace those that were cancelled. On top of another U.S. government report Friday showing more Americans getting coverage, particularly from the Medicaid health [...]
